```{r}
library(tidyverse)
source("source/mean_and_sd.R")
source("source/sim_mean_sd.R")
```

```{r}
output = vector("list", length = 100)

for (i in 1:100) {
  output[[i]] = sim_mean_sd(30)
}

output |> 
  bind_rows() |> #stacks individual dataframe
  ggplot(aes(x=mu_hat)) +
  geom_density()
```

Try to repeat with map statement

```{r}
sim_results_df = 
  expand_grid(
    sample_size = 30,
    iter = 1:100
) |> 
  mutate(
  results = map(iter, sim_mean_sd, n = 30)
) |> 
  unnest(results)
```
